text: Tanuja Mukherjee, popularly known as Tanuja, (born 23 Spetember 1943) is an Indian movie actress. She is the mother of Kajol and Tanisha. She is known for her roles in Baharen Phir Bhi Aayengi (1966), Jewel Thief, Haathi Mere Saathi (1971), and Anubhav (1971). Tanuja was born in Bombay, Bombay Presidency, British India. ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:People from Bombay Category:Indian child actors Category:Marathi people
title: Tanuja
